tag_list: social-media, radio, audio, mobile, content-curation, community-building, affinity-programs, marketing, distribution, communications, business-development
overview: Alisa Miller is business builder, media and tech leader focusing on the intersection of people’s interests, storytelling, social media and mass media. She is currently President & CEO of PRI, Public Radio International, and is the first woman to head a public radio network. She was recently named one of the most influential women in technology by Fast Company magazine (2011). Prior to PRI, she was the director of business development for Sesamestreet.com and .org, where she launched the company’s first ebook and Internet radio initiatives.
